message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me there?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $95. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $92?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $97. It's the highest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you!
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $90?
